mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ( SELECT a.id FROM property.t_proprietor_house a LEFT JOIN property.t_proprietor b ON a.proprietor_id = b.id LEFT JOIN property.t_house c ON a.project_id = c.project_id AND a.house_num = c.house_num LEFT JOIN basic.t_customer d ON b.cust_global_id = d.global_id LEFT JOIN property.t_project e ON e.id = a.project_id ) AS t
mapper.sql: SELECT u.id AS id, u.user_global_id AS userGlobalId, u.cust_global_id AS custGlobalId, u.register_type AS registerType, u.mobile AS mobile, u.activate_time AS activateTime, u.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime, u.status AS status, u.oem_code AS oemCode, p.project_id AS projectId, h.building_id AS buildingId, h.floor_id AS floorId, h.house_num AS houseNum, u.create_time AS createTime FROM basic.t_user u LEFT JOIN property.t_proprietor p ON p.cust_global_id = u.cust_global_id AND p.phone = u.mobile AND p.oem_code = u.oem_code LEFT JOIN property.t_proprietor_house ph ON ph.proprietor_id = p.id LEFT JOIN property.t_house h ON h.project_id = ph.project_id AND h.house_num = ph.house_num WHERE h.house_num IS NOT NULL

SELECT u.id AS id, u.user_global_id AS userGlobalId, u.cust_global_id AS custGlobalId, u.register_type AS registerType, u.mobile AS mobile, u.activate_time AS activateTime, u.last_login_time AS lastLoginTime, u.status AS status, u.oem_code AS oemCode, r.project_id AS projectId, h.building_id AS buildingId, h.floor_id AS floorId, h.house_num AS houseNum, u.create_time AS createTime FROM basic.t_user u LEFT JOIN property.t_resident r ON r.cust_global_id = u.cust_global_id AND r.mobile = u.mobile AND r.oem_code = u.oem_code LEFT JOIN property.t_resident_house rh ON rh.resident_id = r.id LEFT JOIN property.t_house h ON h.id = rh.house_id WHERE h.house_num IS NOT NULL
